duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform phlebotomy and various technical and clerical functions in the Laboratory.
Handle blood, tissue, fecal matter, sputum, urine, spinal fluid, and other body fluids.
Process specimens according to established lab guidelines with customer focus, teamwork, adaptability to change.
Demonstrate routine laboratory procedures based on principles of human growth and development.
Comply with safety guidelines and handle contaminated specimens with infectious diseases.
